item.title: Nearly finished my server some questions left (client sided)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“patsquare, post:1, topic:303948”]1. how do i make it so noone can leach client
2.how to make an ipchanger connect to my serevr only and taht box doesnt coem up to change ip
oh and im using a 508 client[/quote]

  1. NO matter what method you use, people will always be able to leech your client. If you release it, it’s leechable.
  2. You can disable the JButton/JMenuItem so that it isn’t displayed on the GUI.

Read full topic
